Articles.Content:
After weeks of frustration, I finally hit the sweet spot on Munar landing (my time has been limited, so I haven\'t been able to practice as much as I\'d have liked).

Although the crew lost a landing gear, and doesn\'t have enough fuel to return home (left both RCS and the engine on a bit longer than I should have, but I was getting excited by the descent!), they are safely on the Mun, awaiting the next intrepid team to rescue them!

After weeks of frustration, I finally hit the sweet spot on Munar landing (my time has been limited, so I haven\'t been able to practice as much as I\'d have liked).

Although the crew lost a landing gear, and doesn\'t have enough fuel to return home (left both RCS and the engine on a bit longer than I should have, but I was getting excited by the descent!), they are safely on the Mun, awaiting the next intrepid team to rescue them!

Sorry about the above post, some dumb troll found his way onto the forum. He will be banned soon. Well done on landing on the mun, something I have yet to do myself. Now try getting back.

wired, I\'d like to apologize for the, ah, \'bricking\' of your thread by that imbecile, and I hope he is soon banned for his offenses.

Many happy launchings!

(Successes? Those are no fun!)

Ninja\'d! Curses!

Also, it seems the offending (boy, was it!) post has been removed, so we can continue on with our lives in relative peace.

wired, I\'d like to apologize for the, ah, \'bricking\' of your thread by that imbecile, and I hope he is soon banned for his offenses.

Many happy launchings!

(Successes? Those are no fun!)

Ninja\'d! Curses!

Also, it seems the offending (boy, was it!) post has been removed, so we can continue on with our lives in relative peace.

It was a 11 year old boy who doesn\'t know the difference between trolling, spam and getting everyone to hate you.

Hehe, never saw it, so not worried in the least . Besides, I\'ve been trolled by the best of them before this

Tried a few more times tonight with some 'other' options on Mun landing, but couldn\'t get the rocket science to cooperate. Kerbal physics is ... interesting, to say the least!

*edit* and please, call me 'Wire' instead of 'Wired' (although both are appropriate depending on how late I\'m posting LOL ... I\'m a chronic insomniac, and often have a cup of coffee or energy drink in hand when posting. My personal physician is not amused!)
Nice one. Also, don\'t think about them being stuck there, this is the first manned Mun base. Good job!

It was a 11 year old boy who doesn\'t know the difference between trolling, spam and getting everyone to hate you.

I think you\'ve misinterpreted my expression of emphasis as a question regarding the age of the person in question...
